forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 41 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7am, then a chance of snow between 7am and 8am, then a chance of snow showers between 8am and 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 36. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: No lifts today due to power issues.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are covered in heavy wet snow this morning. We do not plan to groom today.
nubsNob.comments:
UPDATE- Nub's Nob will not open on March 20.

Due to frequent power blinks we are not able to run our chairlifts today. The lodge will remain opened until noon today. We plan to open tomorrow for skiing and riding at 9 AM.
